name: Telesky Shoppoing
overview:
TeleSky Group is the No.1 Direct Response Marketing Company in North America, Europe and Asia-Pacific, and we are rapidly expanding our customer base to South Africa and the Middle East. At TeleSky Shopping, we specialize in marketing consumables that can be broadly categorized as Health/Wellness, Educational, Lifestyle and Religious & Astrology products. These are sold through multiple platforms, which include TV, internet, special events and news media. Additionally, we collaborate with international brands and help them reach out to fast growing markets like India.

Our products are meticulously selected and are oriented towards enabling customers improve their lives. One of our core competencies is developing media for effective marketing of products. To ensure a better shopping experience, we ascertain that end users are well informed about our consumables, which are extensively advertised through television, internet and outdoor marketing at locations like shopping malls. Our services are prompt and products are priced competitively. Being a customer oriented organization; we focus on conducting our everyday activities in a consumer friendly manner at all times. In past, we have successfully partnered with some world class Direct Marketing companies, and have enabled suppliers to promote their products in varied demographics and segregated upcoming markets all across the world. Our experience gives us a detailed know how about consumer buying patterns in diverse international markets.

Our e-commerce website, www.teleskyshopping.com has a large number of products for sale, which are shipped at all places in the world. Each of the products is carefully selected to ensure that they add value to customersâ€™ life and have a positive effect on their health and well-being. These consumables can be ordered through phone, or over the internet. Through our efficient service, effective marketing and timely delivery of products, we ensure customer retention and are able to reach out to new consumers who are looking to shop online. Direct response television (DRTV) marketing enables us to expand our reach to consumers across communities which may not be using English as their primary language. We specialize in reaching out to customers in their local dialects, to ensure that more and more people across different demographics are aware about the products that we sell. We give our customers an opportunity to shop for quality products, right from the comfort of their homes. Elaborate product descriptions are created for each of the products, to ensure that a customer can make an informed choice and find a product that is particularly useful for him. We have products that cater to the requirements of customers from all age groups.

Some of our most popular products are from category of health & lifestyle, wherein the consumables are directed towards enabling a better lifestyle for buyers by promoting good health and well being. Some such products include home gym equipment and natural sweeteners. Our product list also includes many Ayurvedic remedies and herbal products, which impact usersâ€™ lives positively while having multiple health benefits. Products available on our website are often unique because they can be purchased easily from anywhere in the world and have a high utility for consumers.
